it.apice.sapere.node.networking.bluetooth.impl
Class BluetoothManagerAgent

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl.AbstractSAPEREAgentImpl
          it.apice.sapere.node.agents.AbstractSystemAgent
              it.apice.sapere.node.networking.bluetooth.impl.BluetoothManagerAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
SAPEREAgent, Subscriber, Runnable
public final class BluetoothManagerAgent
extends AbstractSystemAgent

This class represents an entity capable of handling Bluetooth local devices (currently only one) and exploiting in order to enact a secondary means of communication between nodes.

During RDF-based LSA-space integration phase, some refactoring and debug has been done.

Author:
Michele Morgagni, Paolo Contessi
